question:
Which of the following constitute the All-India services?
1. Indian Administrative Service (IAS)
2. Indian Police Service (IPS)
3. Indian Forest Service (IFS)
4. Indian Economic Service (IES)
explanation: Presently there are only three all-India services. They are: (1) Indian Administrative Service (IAS), (2) Indian Police Service (IPS) and (3) Indian Forest Service (IFS).
